xdebugConfCopySuccess: xdebug configuration template copied to clipboard
obfuscatorSrc: PHP file or folder to be obfuscated
obfuscatorDesc: Save the file or folder, not duplicate the source file or folder
display_errors: Whether to output detailed error information
file_uploads: Is it allowed to upload files
upload_max_filesize: Maximum size allowed for uploading files
max_file_uploads: Maximum number of files allowed to be uploaded simultaneously
error_log_dir: Specify the PHP error log file path
